repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

did.unittitle: Phi Delta and Sigma Nu Fraternity Records

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into two series: Phi Delta/Sigma Nu Fraternity and Web crawls.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Foldered materials removed from the Russell Miller subject collection, Activities and Organizations. Sigma Nu tile donated by Robert B. Spence, son of Robert A. Spence class of 1935. Subject Folders were removed from the Russell Miller subject files, Activities and Organizations (UA024).
Web sites were crawled by Archive-It. Web crawl information updated in finding aid annually.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Tufts Phi Delta chapter was founded in 1915. It was a local chapter only and not affiliated with the national organization. Phi Delta discontinued in 1938 due to the Depression and was reformed in 1948. In 1950, Phi Delta became the Zeta Eta chapter of Sigma Nu.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish.
No documentation is available regarding the intellectual property rights in this collection.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of subject files, artifacts, and web crawls related to the Phi Delta and Sigma Nu fraternities. The subject files contain photographs, correspondence, and an annual report.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

controlaccess.subject: Student life
Student Activities -- Student Government, Clubs, and Organizations

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series consists of subject files and artifacts related to the Phi Delta and Sigma Nu fraternities.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Quarterly web crawls of the Sigma Nu Fraternity - Zeta Eta Chapter (Tufts University) website crawled by DCA, as part of the Student Organizations web collection, to document the presesence of Tufts University student organizations on the web.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids
otherfindaid.p: To see all of websites crawled as part of the Student Organizations web collection, please visit https://archive-it.org/collections/6387
